Name: Zoning, 5602-5604 Broadway Rezoning, Bronx (N 240279 ZRX).
Title: Application number N 240279 ZRX (5602-5604 Broadway Rezoning) submitted by Riverdale Garage Corp., pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F (Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas and Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Areas) for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 8, Council District 11.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
